channel.title: Quick Error [525] [Client-Sided]
channel.description: I am having a little difficulty opening a client of the 525 revision. The cmd will pop up and then disappear instantly, saying "The system could not find the path specified." Here is the code. [code=java]@echo off title client cd src java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1 exit[/code] no I'm not ignorant, I do know how to change my variables and shit, but this is just not working.

item.title: Quick Error [525] [Client-Sided]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

DAn0194:

It can’t find your jdk.

^This, or it’s trying to go to src, which may not exist (I wouldn’t know) if that’s the case then that’s your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Error [525] [Client-Sided]
item.dc:creator: @1800getk0ed 1800getk0ed
item.description:
@1800getk0ed wrote:

I am having a little difficulty opening a client of the 525 revision. The cmd will pop up and then disappear instantly, saying “The system could not find the path specified.”
Here is the code.

@echo off title client cd src java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1 exit
no I’m not ignorant, I do know how to change my variables and shit, but this is just not working.

Read full topic
